channel.title: Regarding Locs/Defs/Npcs etc
channel.description:
Probably going to regret posting this, but i havn't attempted looking at a source properly since 2008. I'm not full of java knowledge however, I can interpret programming languages and don't normally having problems finding what i need to change to fix/change something. However, I'm completely stumped as the last time i worked on things like "shops.xml" they had the item id the amount and price, now it has a price modifier.
So the problems are as below if anybody could kindly point me in the correct directions ( the source is an easyrsc, i have a feeling it one somebodys edited and cocked up maybe, but not sure. )
1. I cannot purchase ammulets out of edge store when i click buy nothing happens, however it lets me purchase the manta rays and another random item in there.
2. Does anybody have a master fisher.java? I have atleast 4 different sources and not one have this. However the npc exists in-game
3. Another issue I'm having is when trying to unpack loading.rscd it gives me an error "error opening zip file" and then below that line just says "null". However it lets me unpack sprites.rscd etc
There the three off the top of my head i am having problems with at the moment. For the first one I'm sure a price may need changing somewhere or a value of some sort just which and where is the question.
Much appreaciated if somebody can drop a message or two with a helpful answer.
Regards

item.title: Regarding Locs/Defs/Npcs etc
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

Oh I understand.
A tip: Open up Loading.rscd with paint, replace your current loading logo with your new one & save.

You’re welcome. ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Regarding Locs/Defs/Npcs etc
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Tbh, I just wanted to to change the loading screen, but i deleted it so it’s just blank now, I repacked the sprites.rscd just with a runescape logo like thing and it looks fine.

As for the rest I’ll take a look when i get home in 45 minutes, thank you for your help Crooks i appreaciate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Regarding Locs/Defs/Npcs etc
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

Item.rscd in client + server-side need to have equal prices.
Server side=\conf\server\defs\ItemDef.xml
Client side=Items.rscd

Use 7zip or another program, replace the client loc with the loc from server-side.

Master fisher -> http://up.ht/zUlPCn You can change the current ID 546(sharks) to whatever ID you want.

Why unpack it? What are you going todo with it? Use paint or another graphic program.

Read full topic
